availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ephraim P. Robinson (Caldwell Co., KY, laborer in Bedford Co. TN 1850)

body.p: Bedford County, Tennessee, and Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer. Tennessee native. Married to Margaret Robinson. Married to Ann T. Smith Robinson in Princeton, Kentucky, on May 9, 1865. Laborer in Bedford County, Tennessee, in 1850. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bedford County, District 5, p. 128B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Tennessee, p. 181.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #001929335, p. 14.
KYR-0001-020-0032.
